   20: %%
   21: -module(inets_socketwrap_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   24: -include("inets_test_lib.hrl").
   25: 
   26: %% Note: This directive should only be used in test suites.
   27: -compile(export_all).
   28: 
   29: suite() -> 
   30:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   31: 
   32: all() -> 
   33:     [start_httpd_fd].
   34: 
   35: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   36:     case os:type() of
   37: 	{unix, linux} ->
   38: 	    Config;
   39: 	_ ->
   40: 	    {skip, linux_feature}
   41:     end.
   42: 
   43: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   44:     ok.
   45: 
   46: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   47:     Config.
   48: 
   49: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   50:     Config.
   51: 
   52: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
   53:     end_per_testcase(Case, Config),
   54:     Config.
   55: 
   56: end_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
   57:     inets:stop(),
   58:     Config.
   59: 
   60: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
   61: start_httpd_fd() ->
   62:     [{doc, "Start/stop of httpd service with socket wrapper"}].
   63: start_httpd_fd(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   64:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
   65:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
   66:     HttpdConf = [{port, 80}, {ipfamily, inet},
   67: 		 {server_name, "httpd_fd_test"}, {server_root, PrivDir},
   68: 		 {document_root, PrivDir}, {bind_address, any}],
   69:     case setup_node_info(node()) of
   70: 	{skip, _}  = Skip ->
   71: 	    Skip;
   72: 	{Node, NodeArg} ->
   73: 	    InetPort = inets_test_lib:inet_port(node()),
   74: 	    ct:log("Node: ~p  Port ~p~n", [Node, InetPort]),
   75:       	    Wrapper = filename:join(DataDir, "setuid_socket_wrap"),
   76:             Args = ["-s","-httpd_80,0:" ++ integer_to_list(InetPort),
   77:                     "-p",os:find_executable("erl"),"--" | NodeArg],
   78: 	    ct:log("cmd: ~p ~p~n", [Wrapper, Args]),
   79: 	    case open_port({spawn_executable, Wrapper},
   80:                            [stderr_to_stdout,{args,Args}]) of
   81: 	    	Port when is_port(Port) ->
   82: 		    wait_node_up(Node, 200),
   83: 		    ct:pal("~p", [rpc:call(Node, init, get_argument, [httpd_80])]),
   84: 		    {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node, application, ensure_all_started, [inets]),
   85: 		    {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node, inets, start, [httpd, HttpdConf]),
   86: 		    [{port, InetPort}] = rpc:call(Node, httpd, info, [Pid, [port]]),
   87: 		    rpc:call(Node, erlang, halt, []);
   88: 		_  ->
   89: 		    ct:fail(open_port_failed)
   90: 	    end
   91:     end.
   92: 
   93: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
   94: %% Internal functions
   95: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
   96: setup_node_info(nonode@nohost) ->
   97:     {skip, needs_distributed_node};
   98: setup_node_info(Node) ->
   99:     Name = "inets_fd_test",
  100:     NameSw = case net_kernel:longnames() of
  101: 		 false -> "-sname";
  102: 		 _ -> "-name"
  103:              end,
  104:     NodeArgs = ["-detached","-noinput",
  105:                 NameSw, Name, "-setcookie", atom_to_list(erlang:get_cookie())],
  106: 
  107:     [_, Location] = string:tokens(atom_to_list(Node), "$@"),
  108:     TestNode =  Name ++ "@" ++ Location,
  109: 
  110:     {list_to_atom(TestNode), NodeArgs}.
  111: 
  112: wait_node_up(Node, 0) ->
  113:     ct:fail({failed_to_start_node, Node});
  114: wait_node_up(Node, N) ->
  115:     ct:log("(Node ~p: net_adm:ping(~p)~n", [node(), Node]),
  116:     case net_adm:ping(Node) of
  117: 	pong ->
  118: 	    ok;
  119: 	pang ->
  120: 	    ct:sleep(250),
  121: 	    wait_node_up(Node, N-1)
  122:     end.
